description: Try our easy to follow Herbed Roast Chicken recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Roast chicken,Roast,Seafood free,Low salt,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Potato,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Chicken,Peanut free
name: Herbed Roast Chicken Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3 corn cobs, peeled and cut into pieces
750g potatoes, peeled and cut into pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Combine butter, herbs and lemon rind in a bowl. Using your fingers, gently separate the chicken skin from flesh over the breast. Push herb butter under the skin and using your hands spread butter out evenly. Place both chickens into a large roasting pan. Roast for 30 minutes. Add potatoes to pan and roast for a further hour or until cooked through and golden.

Meanwhile, bring a saucepan of water to the boil. Add corn cobs and cook for 2-3 minutes or until tender. Drain, reserving 2 cups of the cooking water. Serve roast chicken with potatoes, corn cobs and gravy.
To make gravy, place pan on medium heat.
Place 2 tablespoons of juices from the roasting tray, sprinkle flour over and stir until combined.
Slowly add reserved cooking water, stirring constantly until smooth. Bring mixture to the boil. Simmer for 2 minutes or until gravy has thickened.
